title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. Build version: 200201151. When searching for references to the field, the search results are not being selected properly.
OB: When searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the external jar, the search results are not being selected.
EB: When searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the external jar, the search results should be selected properly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Make sure JDK1.3.1 is set as the default JRE and that you have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open the java.io.File class.
3. Search for references to the 'tmpFir' field.
4. Observe that the search results are not selected properly.
